short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do calculations instantly on your browser. Smooth action of Spry Accordion makes easy jumping between Standard and Scientific modes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do your calculations on top of your browser. Feel the simplicity compact format of the Standard view or get your Scientific panel just in a single click.  27 buttons Scientific panel will fulfill your basic scientific calculation needs. You also got Permutation and Combination buttons that most of soft calculators not equipped with. Share and enjoy it.
